network-interface.help: options are ETHERNET, WIFI_ESP8266, WIFI_ODIN, WIFI_IDW01M1, WIFI_RTW, MESH_LOWPAN_ND, MESH_THREAD, CELLULAR_WNC14A2A, CELLULAR_BG96

wnc_debug.help: enable or disable WNC debug messages.

wnc_debug_setting.help: bit value 1 and/or 2 enable WncController debug output, bit value 4 enables mbed driver debug output.

bg96_debug.help: enable or disable BG96 debug messages.

bg96-debug-setting.help: bit value 1 and/or 2 enable WncController debug output, bit value 4 enables mbed driver debug output.

esp8266-tx.help: Pin used as TX (connects to ESP8266 RX)

esp8266-rx.help: Pin used as RX (connects to ESP8266 TX)
